dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
5 bar scales on map given in "Stades grecs", "Anciens milles romains", Milles d'Italie", "Lieues d'une heure de chemin", "Lieues communes de France".
Shows topography, drainage, tribal boundaries, places of historical interest.
Features a decorative cartouche with a High Priest, an angel, and the Ark of Covenant.
Descriptive text on right side of map: "Analyse succincte de la carte ..."
Appears in Lattré's Atlas moderne ou collections des cartes, Paris, 1771-1783.
